# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We are committed to maintaining a secure project. The following versions of the `HandsOnAPIs-Python-FastAPI-Examples-Book` repository are actively supported with security updates:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| Main    | :white_check_mark: |


## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take all security vulnerabilities seriously. If you discover a vulnerability in `HandsOnAPIs-Python-FastAPI-Examples-Book`, please report it to us immediately.

**Please DO NOT report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

Instead, please follow these steps:

1.  **Email Us:** Send a detailed email to `chirag127@example.com` (or an appropriate security contact email if available). Please use a descriptive subject line, such as "Security Vulnerability Report - [Brief Description]".
2.  **Provide Details:** In your report, please include:
    *   A clear and concise description of the vulnerability.
    *   The affected version(s) of the repository.
    *   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
    *   Any proof-of-concept code or screenshots, if applicable.
    *   Your suggested remediation or mitigation, if any.
3.  **Assigned Security Team:** Once reported, our assigned security team will acknowledge receipt of your report within **48 hours**. We will investigate the issue and work towards a timely resolution.
4.  **Disclosure:** We will follow responsible disclosure practices. We will not publicly disclose the vulnerability until it has been fixed and a patch is available. We may acknowledge your contribution publicly after the fix is released, if you wish.

Thank you for helping to keep `HandsOnAPIs-Python-FastAPI-Examples-Book` secure!
